# The `AMDGPUInstrInfo.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Implementation of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> class that is common to all AMD GPUs. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Implementation of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> class that is common to all AMD GPUs.
